ChangeList.Description: Add the [presence](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/presence?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and associated methods, and introduced the Presence.Read and Presence.Read.All permissions.
Renamed IVR API Record to [recordResponse](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-record?view=graph-rest-beta).

Removed [onlineMeeting](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/onlinemeeting?view=graph-rest-beta) object properties **isCanceled**, **canceledDateTime**, and **entryExitAnnouncement**. Renamed property **joinUrl** to **joinWebUrl**.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: create call,call answer,call reject,call get,call delete,call mute,call-unmute,call change screen sharing role,call transfer,call redirect,Play a prompt,Record Response,Subscribe to tne,list participants,invite participants,get participants,mute participants,create online meeting,get online meeting,call keep alive
ChangeList.Description: Added the following APIs: [create call](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/application-post-calls?view=graph-rest-1.0), [call answer](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-answer?view=graph-rest-1.0), [call reject](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-reject?view=graph-rest-1.0), [call get](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-get?view=graph-rest-1.0), [call delete](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-delete?view=graph-rest-1.0), [call mute](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-mute?view=graph-rest-1.0), [call-unmute](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-unmute?view=graph-rest-1.0), [call change screen sharing role](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-changescreensharingrole?view=graph-rest-1.0), [call transfer](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-transfer?view=graph-rest-1.0), [call redirect](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-redirect?view=graph-rest-1.0), [Play a prompt](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-playprompt?view=graph-rest-1.0), [Record Response](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-record?view=graph-rest-1.0), [Subscribe to tne](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-subscribetotone?view=graph-rest-1.0), [list participants](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-list-participants?view=graph-rest-1.0), [invite participants](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/participant-invite?view=graph-rest-1.0), [get participants](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/participant-get?view=graph-rest-1.0), [mute participants](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/participant-mute?view=graph-rest-1.0), [create online meeting](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/application-post-onlinemeetings?view=graph-rest-1.0), [get online meeting](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/onlinemeeting-get?view=graph-rest-1.0), and [call keep alive](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-keepalive?view=graph-rest-1.0).
ChangeList.Target: create call,call answer,call reject,call get,call delete,call mute,call-unmute,call change screen sharing role,call transfer,call redirect,Play a prompt,Record Response,Subscribe to tne,list participants,invite participants,get participants,mute participants,create online meeting,get online meeting,call keep alive

ChangeList.Description: Added the following resources: [call](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/call?view=graph-rest-1.0), [participant](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/participant?view=graph-rest-1.0), and [onlineMeeting](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/onlinemeeting?view=graph-rest-1.0).
Added the [delete onlineMeeting](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/onlinemeeting-delete?view=graph-rest-1.0) operation.

Changed return type for [mute](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-mute?view=graph-rest-beta) and [mute participant](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/participant-mute?view=graph-rest-beta) methods from [commsOperation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/commsoperation?view=graph-rest-beta) to [muteParticipantOperation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/muteparticipantoperation?view=graph-rest-beta).

Changed return type for [unmute](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-unmute?view=graph-rest-beta) method from [commsOperation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/commsoperation?view=graph-rest-beta) to [unmuteParticipantOperation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/unmuteparticipantoperation?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added the [keepAlive](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-keepalive?view=graph-rest-beta) action to the [call](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/call?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

Added new action [updateRecordingStatus](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-updaterecordingstatus?view=graph-rest-beta) to [call](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/call?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added new complex type [incomingContext](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/incomingcontext?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added new property **incomingContext** to [call](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/call?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added new property **endpointType** to [participantInfo](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/participantinfo?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type.
Added new property **endpointType** to [invitationParticipantInfo](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/invitationparticipantinfo?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type.
Added new property **recordingStatus** to [recordingInfo](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/recordinginfo?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type.
Removed property **status** from [recordingInfo](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/recordinginfo?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type.

Removed inheritance of [participantInfo](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/participantinfo?view=graph-rest-beta) from [invitationParticipantInfo](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/invitationparticipantinfo?view=graph-rest-beta) complex type.
Added /communications/* APIs for all calls and online meetings. The **/app** path is deprecated. Going forward, use the **/communications** path.
Removed the properties **createdDateTime** and **lastActionDateTime** from the [commsOperation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/commsoperation?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the property **meetingType** from the [onlineMeeting](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/onlineMeeting?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the property **isBroadcast** to the [onlineMeeting](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/onlineMeeting?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Renamed the **resource** property to **resourceUrl** on the [commsNotification](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/commsNotification?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Changed the type of the **code** and **subCode** properties from string to Int32 on the [resultInfo](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/resultInfo?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Renamed the **subcode** property to **subCode** on the [resultInfo](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/resultInfo?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added **mediaState** property to [call](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/call?view=graph-rest-beta) resource
Renamed **recordResourceLocation** property in [recordOperation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/recordoperation?view=graph-rest-beta) resource to **recordingLocation**
Renamed **recordResourceAccessToken** property in [recordOperation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/recordoperation?view=graph-rest-beta) resource to **recordingAccessToken**
Added **capabilities** property to [onlineMeeting](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/onlinemeeting?view=graph-rest-beta) resource
Added **videoTeleconferenceId** property to [onlineMeeting](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/onlinemeeting?view=graph-rest-beta) resource
Added **producers** property to [meetingParticipants](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/meetingparticipants?view=graph-rest-beta) resource
Added **contributors** property to [meetingParticipants](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/meetingparticipants?view=graph-rest-beta) resource
The [application](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/application?view=graph-rest-beta) resource was updated to add a calls collection.
The [operation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/operation?view=graph-rest-beta) resource was updated to support long-running calls and meetings APIs.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: call,creating calls,retrieving a call,deleting (hanging up) a call,answering a call,rejecting a call,redirecting a call,transferring a call,IVR scenarios,playing a prompt,recording a call,cancel media processing,subscribing to touch tone notifications
ChangeList.Description: Added the [call](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/call?view=graph-rest-beta) resource for managing audio/video calls (initially, in Microsoft Teams), including APIs for [creating calls](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/application-post-calls?view=graph-rest-beta), [retrieving a call](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [deleting (hanging up) a call](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-delete?view=graph-rest-beta), [answering a call](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-answer?view=graph-rest-beta), [rejecting a call](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-reject?view=graph-rest-beta), [redirecting a call](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-redirect?view=graph-rest-beta), and [transferring a call](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-transfer?view=graph-rest-beta). We've also added APIs to support [IVR scenarios](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/calls-api-ivr-overview?view=graph-rest-beta): [playing a prompt](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-playprompt?view=graph-rest-beta), [recording a call](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-record?view=graph-rest-beta), [cancel media processing](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-cancelmediaprocessing?view=graph-rest-beta), and [subscribing to touch tone notifications](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-subscribetotone?view=graph-rest-beta).
ChangeList.Target: call,creating calls,retrieving a call,deleting (hanging up) a call,answering a call,rejecting a call,redirecting a call,transferring a call,IVR scenarios,playing a prompt,recording a call,cancel media processing,subscribing to touch tone notifications

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: participant,retrieving a participant object,configuring the audio mixer for a participant,one,all,retrieving a list of the participants,inviting participants
ChangeList.Description: Added the [participant](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/call?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and APIs for managing the participants in audio/video calls and meetings, including [retrieving a participant object](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/participant-get?view=graph-rest-beta), configuring the audio mixer for a participant, muting [one](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/participant-mute?view=graph-rest-beta) or [all](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/participant-muteall?view=graph-rest-beta) of the participants, [retrieving a list of the participants](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-list-participants?view=graph-rest-beta) in a call/meeting, and [inviting participants](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/participant-invite?view=graph-rest-beta) to a call/meeting.
ChangeList.Target: participant,retrieving a participant object,configuring the audio mixer for a participant,one,all,retrieving a list of the participants,inviting participants

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: share content,mute and unmute itself,update the metadata associated with a call
ChangeList.Description: Added APIs for applications to manage and participate in calls and meetings, including the ability to [share content](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-changescreensharingrole?view=graph-rest-beta), [mute and unmute itself](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-unmute?view=graph-rest-beta), and update the metadata associated with a call.
ChangeList.Target: share content,mute and unmute itself,update the metadata associated with a call

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: audio routing group,creating audio routing groups,retrieving a list of them,updating,deleting
ChangeList.Description: Added the [audio routing group](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/audioroutinggroup?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and APIs for managing private audio routes between participants in a multiparty conversation, including [creating audio routing groups](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/call-post-audioroutinggroups?view=graph-rest-beta), [retrieving a list of them](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/audioroutinggroup-get?view=graph-rest-beta), and [updating](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/audioroutinggroup-update?view=graph-rest-beta) and [deleting](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/audioroutinggroup-delete?view=graph-rest-beta) them.
ChangeList.Target: audio routing group,creating audio routing groups,retrieving a list of them,updating,deleting

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: online meeting,retrieve an online meeting object,audio conference information
ChangeList.Description: Added the [online meeting](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/audioroutinggroup?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and APIs for managing Microsoft Teams online meetings. Initially, there is only one API for online meetings, to [retrieve an online meeting object](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/onlinemeeting-get?view=graph-rest-beta). A related resource for the [audio conference information](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/audioconferencing?view=graph-rest-beta) associated with a meeting (e.g. dial-in URL, passcodes, and phone numbers) was also added.
ChangeList.Target: online meeting,retrieve an online meeting object,audio conference information

ChangeList.Description: Many of the calls and meetings APIs take time to complete, so resources for these long-running operations were added: [calling-specific operations](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/commsoperation?view=graph-rest-beta), [playing audio prompts](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/playpromptoperation?view=graph-rest-beta), and [recording](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/recordoperation?view=graph-rest-beta).
